articles.title: What is Oropouche fever; know the symptoms of this mosquito-borne disease - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Italy reported its first case of Oropouche fever, a mosquito-borne disease common in Latin and South America, this month. | Health
articles.content: Italy reported its first-ever case of Oropouche fever, a mosquito-borne disease, on June 15. Its also the first case ever to be detected in continental Europe. Latin America and the Caribbean have al… [+2651 chars]

articles.title: What a Study on Ultraprocessed Fake Meat and Heart Disease Really Found - Scientific American
articles.description: A recent study found that eating ultraprocessed plant-based foods was linked to heart attack and stroke risk. But the devil is in the details
